data.title: Delta Goodrem announces engagement to guitarist Matthew Copley: 'Forever'
data.meta_description: The Aussie singer-songwriter has announced that she and her long-time boyfriend Matthew Copley are engaged. Read more.
data.text:
Less than a week after wrapping up her whirlwind European tour, Delta Goodrem has announced that she and her long-time boyfriend Matthew Copley are engaged.

The Aussie singer-songwriter took to social media on Thursday evening to share that Matthew, who works as her guitarist, had popped the question while on holiday in Malta.

“My best friend asked me to marry him,” she wrote in the caption alongside a ring emoji.

The first snap shows Delta and Matthew embracing in front of a magnificent seaside view as the sun sets and they enjoy a glass of champagne.

RELATED:

Delta Goodrem shares heartbreaking confession about fame: 'Huge lesson'

Love Is In The Air: Everything we know about Delta Goodrem's Netflix rom-com

Delta Goodrem's emotional update 20 years after cancer diagnosis: 'Mixed emotions'

She followed this up with a video of a string quartet playing Elton John’s ‘Your Song’ in the garden surrounded by white rose petals, before panning to show her sparkling engagement ring.

'Forever'

Delta’s famous followers quickly flooded her comments section with congratulatory messages, including Sophie Monk, Amy Shark, Samantha Jade, Calum Scott and Natalie Imbruglia.

“Such beautiful news!! So happy for you sweetheart. Huge congrats to you both,” Lisa Wilkinson wrote, followed by Kylie Gillies who said, “Now THAT’s something to sing about. Congratulations to you both. Marvellous Malta memory right there”.

“Oh my!!! Congratulations you gorgeous pair. I am overjoyed,” Rove McManus replied, while Jessica Origliasso from The Veronicas added, “Congratulations angel!!!!!!! You deserve all the happiness in the universe!!! XX so happy for you both”.

The Voice star Rachael Leahcar, who Delta coached on season one of the reality show, shared: “DIBS ON WEDDING SINGER!!! Congrats girl, that’s so very special and I’m so, so happy for you both! He seems like a lovely chap and you make a gorgeous couple.”

Matthew also left a sweet comment on Delta’s post, writing: “My forever love!”

Delta's relationship history

Delta was previously engaged to Irish pop singer Brian McFadden from 2007 to 2011 and has also dated Nick Jonas and tennis star Mark Philippousiss.

She and Matthew began dating in late 2017, although they have remained rather private about their relationship and never appear on a red carpet together.

SHOP:

The 'fantastic' sustainable sunglasses you need this spring

Win $10,000 of custom jewellery from Australia's top diamond house

Aussie sisters launch line of pink apparel and accessories with a difference

The Born to Try hitmaker spoke openly about their romance for the first time in February this year, telling Australian Women's Weekly that they had met through music.

“It's incredible to be on stage with him because he's so talented. We really are a team. He's my best friend, he's kind and a beautiful human being,” she shared.

“I'm very lucky. It's all very natural and I think that comes from a beautiful respect and love. I feel so grateful.”

The couple recently launched their own independent record label called ATLED Records and have co-written a number of tracks together, including Delta’s latest single ‘Back to Your Heart’.
